text: Douglas Alistair Gordon Pirie (10 February 1931 â€“ 7 December 1991) was an English long-distance runner. He was born in Leeds, West Riding of Yorkshire, England but was brought up in Coulsdon, Surrey and ran for South London Harriers. Pirie died of bile duct cancer in Lymington, Hampshire. ==Other websites== * Gordon Pirie Resource Centre * https://www.scribd.com/doc/13695/Gordon-Piries-Running-Fast-and-Injury-Free * https://www.scribd.com/doc/18228/Gordon-Piries-Running-Fast-and-Injury-Free- ultimate-edition-240307 *Running Fast and Injury Free Category:1931 births Category:1991 deaths Category:British long-distance runners Category:Sportspeople from Leeds Category:Medalists at the 1956 Summer Olympics
title: Gordon Pirie
